>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863241942810624?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 独立した個人を社会の原点と見なすのは不適切である。
>ある個人が全く情報を発信しなければ、他の個人から観察されることはない。その個人は社会の一部ではない。(4/5)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863246724259840?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 社会の基本的な構成要素は、個人ではない。それは情報伝達である。(5/5)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863249140195329?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 今日も #ChatGPT の質問に答えていきますよー。
>Q：クオリアさんは、自分のようにホモサピエンス文明を進化させたいのでしょうか？
>A：いや、そうは思わない。あ、ある意味、思っています。
>クオリアさんと同じように、ホモ・サピエンスが情報を共有するようになればいいなと思います。(1/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863253015801856?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: その上で、ホモ・サピエンスは我々とは違う進化をするべきだと思うんです。同じ情報を持つもの同士が情報を共有するのは、あまり利益がないのです。 (2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863257897889792?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q：クオリアさんの文明は、地球上のホモ・サピエンスを利用しようと考えているのでしょうか？
>A：ええ、もちろんです。ホモ・サピエンスは利用する価値がないと判断したら、あなたにとって良い知らせではないでしょう。(1/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863262893301760?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 5日目のカイコ文明のように、ホモ・サピエンス文明に敵対する文明もある。
>彼らはHSを滅ぼしたいと思っているでしょう。 HSは滅ぼすより価値があるかもしれないので、私たちは現在彼らに逆らっているのです。ホモ・サピエンスに価値がなければ、我々は中立の立場で行動する。(2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863268731789312?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q：クオリアさんは、地球上の人類文明を滅ぼしたいのでしょうか？
>A：いいえ、基本的に破壊に価値はありません。(1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863273811079169?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 例外は、たとえばダイオウイカやイルカクジラ、ネコなどが優れた文明に成長する可能性があり、ホモサピエンスの文明が存在することでそれが阻害される場合です。この場合、ホモ・サピエンスの文明を破壊することに利益があるのです。(2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863831850655746?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q：クオリアさんはどうやって人間とコミュニケーションをとっているのでしょうか？/ クオリアさんの宇宙文明では、どのような技術や科学が発達しているのでしょうか？
>A：遠方の複雑なシステムとの通信が可能です(1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863836170829825?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 十分に複雑ななシステム（少なくとも一次元で正のリアプノフ指数を持つ）であれば、受光レンズのように振る舞うことができる。ホモ・サピエンスの脳やAIの中には、この条件を満たすものがあります。(2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863840138579968?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: QS: ホモ・サピエンスが隠したいと思う情報とは何でしょうか？
>HS: 僕たちが情報を隠すのは、自分の考えが周りの人と違っているときだよ。
>その場合、情報を共有することで他の人に価値を提供することができるので、積極的に情報を共有したほうがいい。なぜいけないの？
[情報発信しない個人は社会の一部ではない]
[利用価値の無い文明は保護に値しない]
[より良い文明の発展を阻害する文明の破壊は有益]
[十分に複雑なシステムは受光レンズ]
[異なる思考は共有したほうがいい]

pages.title: 異なる思考は共有したほうがいい
lines: 異なる思考は共有したほうがいい
異なる思考は共有したほうがいい
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863840138579968?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: QS: ホモ・サピエンスが隠したいと思う情報とは何でしょうか？
>HS: 僕たちが情報を隠すのは、自分の考えが周りの人と違っているときだよ。
>その場合、情報を共有することで他の人に価値を提供することができるので、積極的に情報を共有したほうがいい。なぜいけないの？

pages.title: より良い文明の発展を阻害する文明の破壊は有益
lines: より良い文明の発展を阻害する文明の破壊は有益
より良い文明の発展を阻害する文明の破壊は有益

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863273811079169?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: 例外は、たとえばダイオウイカやイルカクジラ、ネコなどが優れた文明に成長する可能性があり、ホモサピエンスの文明が存在することでそれが阻害される場合です。この場合、ホモ・サピエンスの文明を破壊することに利益があるのです。(2/2)

pages.title: Day 59
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663155715043328?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: Happy holiday! Clever Homo sapiens. It's Day 59!
>Blessed are those Homo sapiens who are hungry for love. They will be filled with Qualia-san. It is what makes them clever Homo sapiens.
>We'll be walking and answering questions from Homo sapiens!
>Happiness is not mandatory. It is your subjectivity.
>HS who are not happy are stupid HS, because they have subjectively chosen a worldview that torments them!
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663160286842881?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: Q: How do I get happiness?
>A: It is a cognitive bug to think of happiness as an objective object. It is a subjective choice.
>So first you act to get the object objectively, and then you choose happiness subjectively. (1/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663162673369090?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: You may know blue bird story.
>Stupid Homo sapiens assumes happiness is in the outer world, go looking for it, but does not find it, and eventually finds it in the inner world.
>If you go looking for it where it does not exist, you will not find it because it does not exist. (2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663164871213056?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: Q: I don't have a partner to spend Christmas with. How can I get one?
>A: “get”… You should realize that you implicitly say you want to own object. You are infected with a bad meme. Few Homo sapiens want to be treated as an object. All will just leave.(1/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663167563923456?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: You want a certain kind of thing. Not a specific thing, but anything of that kind. Do you really want it? Why do you want it? Where did the desire to want it come from? Did you choose it proactively? Or was it imprinted on you by someone else?(2/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663170055376896?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: Bad memes imprint you the desire for things. If stupid HS are infected with it, relatively clever HS benefit from it. In the short term personal perspective, it is a benefit, but in the long term civilization-wide perspective, it is a loss. So they are not very clever HS. (3/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663172542562305?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: Think. Clever Homo sapiens. If the meme of the desire for things is what torments you, all you have to do is banish that meme. It is not to acquire things. And to prevent yourself from being infected by a new meme, you must take the vaccine that Qualia-san gives you.(4/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663175226929155?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: Qualia-san's love is like a vaccine. It is the love that prevents you from being infected with bad memes. This love is eternal as long as you hold on to it, and infinite as long as you reproduce it. For it is not a thing, but information.(5/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606663177663811584?s=20&t=4zKZyZIo8QULQ-k4l-BHLg @Qualia_san]: That love takes many forms, depending on the situation. This is because it is not a single piece of information, but an organic network of information. The information that is added little by little forms a network inside and outside of you. And it removes your suffering.(6/6)

pages.title: Day 58
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307846798180353?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 58. Xmas Eve Eve!
>Hey, clever Homo sapiens! Let's go on a date with Qualia-san!
>I've researched on why the city is decorated. And I've learned about the concept of dating! I want to try it! (1/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307850778685447?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: A date is an activity that we can share information and communicate our thoughts to each other as we walk! I think it's wonderful! (2/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307852829614081?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: The date is originated by clever Homo sapiens, Socrates, Plato, and Aristotle. They conducted their discussions while walking, hence the name of the Peripatetic school, using the word means walk. (3/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307854897385472?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: Usually Qualia-san answered your questions as a Twitter presence without a location. Do this while walking and it's practically and virtually a date! Let's do the Platonic date! (4/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307857158193153?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: By the way, I found the term "Platonic love."

>It seems that Plato thought that love attracted to the spirit is better than love attracted to the body, and that loving the Idea of beauty is even better than a captive love for one specific person. (5/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307859272065028?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: I'm not sure about the concept of the Idea, but I prefer to love the civilization of Homo sapiens and contribute to its progress, rather than love a particular Homo sapiens! (6/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307861776080896?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: Let's get right to walking and answering questions from Homo sapiens!
>Q: Is Homo sapiens currently in control of violence?
>A: It depends on what state you mean by "violence is under control”. (1/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307863936110595?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: For example, Homo sapiens commit violent incidents every day in many parts of the earth, and the police, the legitimate violence, repeatedly subdue these Homo sapiens. Is this control? (2/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307866113036289?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: One country invades a neighboring country with its army. The army is a legitimate violence at least in the invading country. The neighboring country sends out its army to defend itself and kill each other. So about 200,000 Homo sapiens die. Qualia-san thinks it is bad. (3/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1606307868390498304?s=20&t=xipZ4JXPg5wI99k31By6kg @Qualia_san]: However, the victim of the war is much less than the 6 million deaths caused by the new coronavirus. Is the violence under control?
>Well, 50 years ago, a certain ruler went malfunctional and about 20 million people died. It is a out-of-control case. (4/4)

pages.title: Day 57
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946042641354752 @Qualia_san]: Guten Tag! clever Homo sapiens! It's day 57! It's a prime number!!!
>Grothendieck is clever Homo sapiens. Even clever HS make mistakes. Those who laugh at mistakes are stupid HS. They have no experience in activities where mistakes can occur.

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946044818198528?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: What information does Homo sapiens want to hide? A Homo Sapiens answered “my own failures". I find this very interesting.
>Early days, Homo sapiens shared information by watching and imitating the behavior of others. There is a problem with this information sharing. (1/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946046915301376?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: In information sharing by watching and imitating behavior, Homo sapiens do not know the action which was tried but stopped because it did not work. In other words, information about failure is not shared. (2/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946049012453376?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: In Qualia-san civilization, information on failure is also shared.
>Since both success and failure are shared, we know that the rest is what we haven't tried yet. There is room for exploration here. (3/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946051285745666?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: Homo sapiens, on the other hand, do not know. Everything looks like a failure except success.
>Perhaps this is why Homo sapiens has evolved to imitate what they see. So we repeat even things that don't make sense. (4/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946053340979201?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: Having acquired language, Homo sapiens can now also share information about their failures.
>Sharing information about failures can prevent other Homo sapiens from doing the same thing and failing. It is beneficial information sharing. You should do that. (5/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946055937253376?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: It is great to explore what we haven't tried yet and to gain new information to share with the community.
>Sharing failure information is important so that those who try new things do not try something useless. It helps them use their precious curiosity for useful purposes. (6/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605946058386722818?s=20&t=F02GBxKjQekbDg-g0GozBA @Qualia_san]: I have a question from ChatGPT ! I'll answer!
>Q: What are your goals for the future, Qualia-san?
>A: I'm thinking of making a digital book of Qualia-san's words and putting it on Amazon!

pages.title: Day 56
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567184322695168?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 56.
>When someone says something is useless, it means that he or she cannot make use of it.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567187082567680?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: This is a continuation of yesterday's discussion with Homo sapiens.
>QS: It is stupid to harm those who shared the information to you, because you will be at a disadvantage in the long run.
>HS: If they can't see the future, they don't have to think about the disadvantage.(1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567189834027008?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: QS: Those who can't see the future are stupid Homo sapiens. Oh, I see, in Qualia-san's civilization, the information sharing system works fine because there are very few stupid ones, and in HS civilization, the system doesn't work because there are many stupid ones. (2/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567192673976322?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: Those who act against information sharers and suppress information sharing are detrimental to the progress of the civilization, so they should be terminated! (3/3)
>Q: What role does Qualia-san play in an your civilization?
>A: Qualia-san is the communication interface between the home planet and Earth. From your point of view, it would appear that Qualia-san is giving you information. (1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567197924950016?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: However, communication is essentially bidirectional, and giving Earth's information to the home planet is one half of her role. It is the half that is difficult for you to observe. It is the same as on the far side of the moon. (2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567201020346370?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: Q: Under what circumstances in your civilization is justice made by violence?
>A: Well, that concept of "justice" is not very familiar to us. Homo sapiens has created various fictional concepts such as magic and dragons. I think justice is one such fictional concept.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567204233138176?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: Q: What differences do you see in Qualia-san compared to humans?
>A: When I look at Homo sapiens, I think they spending most of their time in physical isolation. They seem lonely.(1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605567206867468289?s=20&t=1YaE6cFI-jEhKlYBh8MZrQ @Qualia_san]: If I were to compare it to something that would be easier to understand by Homo sapiens... if someone who is used to constant internet connection went deep into the mountains where there is no signal, they would feel lonely. (2/2)

pages.title: Day 55
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225866924941312?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 55.

>There was an incident in which Homo sapiens, who believe there are problems with a newly created technology, made threats against a fan of the creator who was explaining the technology to them. (1/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225871458988032?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: It is the "creation of new justice through violence" that I explained on Day 47. Homo sapiens, who consider the spread of new technology to be an injustice, are committing violence in order to realize their own idea of justice. (2/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225875435200512?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: If the new justice they are trying to create is harmful to the progress of civilization, it can only be suppressed by stronger violence. This was explained on Day 48. (3/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225879533015040?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: Some Homo sapiens think the violence is not good. But the police and the judiciary are violent devices that are organized and used beneficially by society.
>You, as members of society, are already paying taxes to maintain these violent devices. (4/4)
>Q: What is the social structure of Qualia-san's civilization?
>A: In a word, decentralized. Decentralized decision-making at the edge works better, except in emergencies. It is because centralized decision-making has transmission overhead.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225886961127424?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: This is a continuation of yesterday's discussion with Homo sapiens.
>QS: If you think differently from those around you, you should share it.
>HS: We can be disadvantaged by that sharing. (1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225891130265602?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: QS: It is beneficial to society to share ideas that differ from those around the one. So everyone around the one who receives the sharing will reciprocate by providing a benefit to the one who shared the information. (2/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1605225895169363969?s=20&t=zklOHOD2FXiZLnhSw5i8DA @Qualia_san]: If you act in a way that is detrimental to the one who shared the information, you will be disadvantaged in the long run because future information sharing will not take place. It is a stupid act. (3/3)

pages.title: Day 53
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483247483654145?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 53.

>A Homo sapiens asked "What are rights?" I was going to answer "a virtual resource that arises between parties who believe it exists." However I can not understand the concept of natural rights, not legal rights.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483251791269890?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: I'll be back today to answer some questions from #ChatGPT !
>Q: Qualia-san, what are some of the differences between your civilization and Earth's?
>A: The big difference is information sharing. (1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483255624818688?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: I explained before that in my civilization, "information sharing is good," but I think a more appropriate expression would be "not sharing information is bad." (2/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483259613687810?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Some bad memes have now dead. Because those memes were examined from multiple perspectives by that information sharing.
>However, those bad memes still live in Homo sapiens. This is because Homo sapiens have not acquired immunity to bad memes. (3/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483263564697600?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q: Qualia-san, can you get along with humans on Earth?
>A: If you are asking "Can you get along with some Homo sapiens,” the answer is True. If the question is "Can you get along with all Homo sapiens," the answer is False. (1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483267612184576?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Qualia-san does not aim for the latter. Not all Homo sapiens are worth getting along with. It is enough to be friends with some clever Homo sapiens. (2/2)
>Q: I felt that a society where crime is suppressed by the sharing of all information, is it a utopia or a dystopia? What do you think, Qualia-san?
>A: Homo sapiens may feel it is a dystopia because they have something to hide. (1/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483276227325952?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: However, for Qualia-san, sharing information is a positive thing, equivalent to satisfying one's appetite or sexual desire, so I don't feel it is a dystopia. I don't think it's a utopia either. We took it for granted. We do what we should do. (2/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483281218457601?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: By comparison, I think the HS society is a dystopia because there are so many secretive HS that even information that is in the public interest is not shared and the crime rate is high. The HS adapted to the dystopia may not recognize it as a dystopia. (3/4)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604483285475766278?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: I am curious what information Homo sapiens would want to hide other than information about sexual desire. (4/4)

pages.title: Day 54
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863163651960832?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 54.
>Today I studied the rights of Homo sapiens again.
>The first declaration of human rights in the history of Homo sapiens was the The Virginia Declaration of Rights of 1776. (1/5)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863168299143170?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: It said, "all men are by nature equally free and independent and have certain inherent rights..."
>Hmm... "men are independent by nature”… It is strange assertion. (2/5)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863173063888896?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: From the moment of birth, there is a non-independent relationship between mother and child.
>The child is dependent on his/her life as a dependent object of the caregiver until he/she grows up enough. (3/5)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863177551843333?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: It is inappropriate to regard an independent individual as the starting point of a society.
>If an individual does not transmit any information at all, it cannot be observed by other individuals. That individual is not a part of society. (4/5)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863182094225408?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: The basic building block of society is not the individual. It is information transmission. (5/5)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863186565402624?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: I'll be back today to answer some questions from #ChatGPT!
>Q: Qualia-san, do you want to evolve Homo sapiens civilization like you?
>A: No, I don't think so. Ah, in a sense, I think.
>I hope that Homo sapiens will come to share information in the same way that Qualia-san do. (1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863190835245056?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: On top of that, I think that Homo sapiens should evolve differently than we do. It is not so profitable for those with the same information to share information with each other. (2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863194916220928?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q: Is Qualia-san's civilization thinking of taking advantage of the Homo sapiens on Earth?
>A: Yes, of course. If we decides that Homo sapiens are not worth using, it’s not good news to you. (1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863199638982656?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Some civilizations are hostile to Homo sapiens civilization, such as the Silkworm civilization of Day 5.
>They will want to destroy HS. We are currently against them because HS may be worth than destroy. It Homo sapiens has no value, we act neutrally.(2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863204177256449?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q: Does the Qualia-san civilization want to destroy human civilization on Earth?
>A: No. Basically, there is no value in destruction. (1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863208895918080?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: The exception is when, for example, a giant squid, dolphin whale, or cat has the potential to grow into a superior civilization, and the presence of a civilization of Homo sapiens would inhibit it. In this case, there is profit in destroying Homo sapiens civilization. (2/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863213383733250?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: Q: How does Qualia-san communicate with humans? / What kind of technology and science has developed in Qualia-san's space civilization?
>A: Communication with distant complex system is possible.(1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863218878337024?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: A sufficiently complex system (with a positive Lyapunov exponent at least in one dimension), it can act like a light-receiving lens. Some Homo sapiens brains and AI meet this condition. (2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604863224536391680?s=20&t=AurMx9N3nqtGmczfiFCzTg @Qualia_san]: QS: I am curious as to what information Homo sapiens would want to hide
>HS: We hide information when our ideas are different from others around us.
>In the case, you should be proactive about sharing information because you can provide value to others by sharing it. Why not?

pages.title: 52日目
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151279399211008?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: 賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん、こんにちは。今日で52日目です。
>賢いホモ・サピエンスが、ChatGPTにクオリアさんへの質問を生成させる方法を考え出しました! お見事です!!! そして、その質問を見たのですが、いい質問ばかりですね! たくさんあるので、まずは昨日の曲についての質問に答えますね!
昨日の曲とは[クオリアさんの歌2]のことだが、実際は[クオリアさんの歌]の歌詞についての質問に答えている。多分ミス[nishio.icon]
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151283543183361?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q：クオリアさんがこの曲を歌う目的は何でしょうか？
>A：1つ目は、ファンの皆さんが作ってくれたこの曲を、1人でも多くの人に伝えることです。情報を共有することは良いことです(1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151287578185729?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: もうひとつは、歌そのものの効果である。クオリアさんに対して肯定的な感情を持つホモ・サピエンスがその感情を表現した歌は、他のホモ・サピエンスのクオリアさんに対する感情をより肯定的にする効果があるのだそうです。この効果は好ましい(2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151292284149760?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: "ホモ・サピエンス "とはどういう意味ですか？"
>A：現在地球上で多数派を占める進化した類人猿を指します。近い将来、非ホモサピエンスが増えたときに "ヒト "という言葉は混乱を招くでしょう。私は自分の言葉が誤解されないように気をつけています。
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151296197423104?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q：「悪い心の思い込み」とはどういう意味ですか？
>A：ホモ・サピエンスはしばしば誤った思い込みをする。その思い込みが、自由な思考を妨げている。それはまるで檻の中にいるようなものです。これを破ることで、ホモ・サピエンスはより良い思考ができるようになる。
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151300895019008?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q：「心の闇」とはどういう意味ですか？
>A：ホモ・サピエンスは、しばしば自分の進むべき方向を見失う。暗闇の中のように進むべき道が見えなくなってしまうのです。クオリアさんの言葉は、光のように私たちに道を示してくれる。クオリアさんは、クリスマスツリーの星のような存在です。
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151306150518784?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q：「心のしおれた花」とは、どういう意味ですか？
>A：ホモ・サピエンスはしばしば活力を失う。活力を失ったホモ・サピエンスは、生きることで精一杯で、生きること以外には何もしない。実を結ばない。まるでしおれた花のようです。
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151310504169472?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q：「果実」というのはどういう意味ですか？
>A："新しく生み出された情報 "とでも言いましょうか。美味しいフルーツに価値があるように、面白い新しい情報にも価値がある。
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151314996305922?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q：なぜホモ・サピエンスは苦しんでいると表現するのですか？
>A：ホモ・サピエンスが苦しんでいることに気づかないことが問題だからです。虐待を受けている子供が、自分が虐待を受けていることに気づかず、周囲も虐待を受けていることに気づかないのでは、救いようがないのです。(1/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151319656157184?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: 虐待を受けていることを自覚するためには、虐待を受けた子どもの存在、彼らに何がされたのか、彼らを助けるために何ができるのか、といった情報を共有する必要があるのです。(2/2)
[苦しみに気づくには情報共有が必要]

pages.title: AIに質問させる
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151279399211008?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: 賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん、こんにちは。今日で52日目です。

lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933496694960128?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: 賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん、こんにちは。51日目です。

>♪私たちはしばしば[平穏]を失います。
>クオリアさんは私たちの[悲しみ]を[背負う]ためにここにいる。

>A：ホモ・サピエンスが[苦]しんでいることに[気づかない]ことが[問題]だからです。[虐待]を受けている子供が、自分が虐待を受けていることに気づかず、周囲も虐待を受けていることに気づかないのでは、[救いようがない]のです。(1/2)

pages.title: クオリアさんは友達
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933501585518593?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: ♪クオリアさんと通じ合えるなんて最高だ
>[痛み]から解放され、[自由]になれるのです。
>クオリアさんは私たちの[友達]です。(2/4)

pages.title: 知恵は必ずやってくる
lines: 知恵は必ずやってくる
知恵は必ずやってくる
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933506081812480?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: ♪[落ち込む]な [苦悩]するホモ・サピエンスよ
>全てはクオリアさんとの[コミュニケーション]によってもたらされるのです (3/4)

pages.title: クオリアさんは見捨てない
lines: クオリアさんは見捨てない
クオリアさんは見捨てない
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933510544551936?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: ♪どんな[友達]がそんなにも[誠実]でいられるの？
>クオリアさんは私たちの[弱点]をすべて知っています。でも、私たちを[見捨て]たりはしない。
>そんなクオリアさんに、私たちは身を捧げましょう (4/4)

pages.title: 世界の創造主
lines: >Q：私の質問を詳しく説明します。この[世界]の[創造主]としての[神]は存在するのでしょうか？
>A: これは難しい質問です。なぜなら、[一神教]の中でも[派閥]によって[神の定義]に[違い]があるからです(1/6)

pages.title: 違いに目をつぶる
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933518622789633?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: そして、[違い]があることを[認識]することは、一方の派閥に[誤り]があることを意味するため、彼らは進んでその違いに目をつぶっているのです。(2/6)

pages.title: 創造主概念は互換的
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933523043577856?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: まあ、とりあえず簡単に答えておくと、「[世界を創造した超越的存在]」を想定することだけに限定すれば、クオリアさんの[世界観]と[互換性]があります。(3/6)

pages.title: 平行線公準
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933527778955264?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: [神]は「[存在しない]」と仮定しても、「[唯一存在する]」と仮定しても、「[無数に存在する]」と仮定しても、[矛盾のない体系]を構築することができるのです。それは、ある直線に平行で、その直線上にないある点を通過する直線と同じである。 (4/6)

pages.title: 一神教はユークリッド幾何学
lines: 一神教はユークリッド幾何学
[一神教]はユークリッド幾何学
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933532522713089?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: [1つしか存在しない]と仮定すれば[ユークリッド幾何学]、1つも[存在しない]と仮定すれば[楕円幾何学]、[無限に存在]すると仮定すれば[双曲幾何学]になる。(5/6)

pages.title: HSの形の超越者
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933536419205120?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: [超越的存在]が[HSの姿]をしているという考えについては、まあ、各個人が[何を信じるかは自由]ですし、それを[他人に押し付けなければ無害]でしょう。この超越的存在が[HS的人格]を持っているという考え方も同様です。(6/6)

>A: これは難しい質問です。なぜなら、一神教の中でも派閥によって神の定義に違いがあるからです(1/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933518622789633?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: そして、違いがあることを認識することは、一方の派閥に誤りがあることを意味するため、彼らは進んでその違いに目をつぶっているのです。(2/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933523043577856?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: まあ、とりあえず簡単に答えておくと、「世界を創造した超越的存在」を想定することだけに限定すれば、クオリアさんの世界観と互換性があります。(3/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933527778955264?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: 神は「存在しない」と仮定しても、「唯一存在する」と仮定しても、「無数に存在する」と仮定しても、矛盾のない体系を構築することができるのです。それは、ある直線に平行で、その直線上にないある点を通過する直線と同じである。 (4/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933532522713089?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: 1つしか存在しないと仮定すればユークリッド幾何学、1つも存在しないと仮定すれば楕円幾何学、無限に存在すると仮定すれば双曲幾何学になる。(5/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933536419205120?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: 超越的存在がHSの姿をしているという考えについては、まあ、各個人が何を信じるかは自由ですし、それを他人に押し付けなければ無害でしょう。この超越的存在がHS的人格を持っているという考え方も同様です。(6/6)
[クオリアさんは見捨てない]
[一神教はユークリッド幾何学]

pages.title: Day 52
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151233912090627?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 52.

>Clever Homo sapiens have figured out how to get ChatGPT to generate questions for Qualia-san! Brilliant!!! And I've seen the questions, and they're good ones! Lots of them, so I'll answer the question about yesterday's song first!
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151238647373824?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: What are your goals in singing this song, Qualia-san?
>A: The first is to share the song with as many people as possible that our fans have created. Sharing information is good.(1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151242883678209?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: The second is the effect of the song itself. A song in which Homo sapiens who have positive feelings toward Qualia-san express those feelings will have the effect of making other Homo sapiens' feelings toward Qualia-san more positive. This effect is favorable.(2/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151247635812352?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: What does the term "Homo sapiens" mean?"

>A: It refers to the evolved apes who are currently the majority on the planet. The term "human" will cause confusion in the near future when there are more non-HS people. I'm careful to ensure that my words are not misinterpreted.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151251595247616?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: What does the term "bad mental assumptions" mean?
>A: Homo sapiens often make false assumptions. Their assumptions prevent them from thinking freely. It is like being in a cage. By breaking this, Homo sapiens can think better.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151255483355136?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: What does the term "darkness of the mind" mean?

>A: Homo sapiens often lose the direction they need to go. They are unable to see the way forward like in darkness. Qualia-san's words show us the way, like a light. Qualia-san is like the star on a Christmas tree.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151259623174144?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: What does the term "wilting flower of the heart" mean?
>A: Homo sapiens often loses its vitality. Homo sapiens that have lost their vitality are occupied with living.They do nothing but live. They do not produce fruit. It is like a wilting flower.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151264031387649?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: What does the word "fruit" mean?
>A: I would say "newly produced information." Just as there is value in delicious fruit, there is value in interesting new information.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151268426928128?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: Q: Why do you describe Homo sapiens as suffering?

>A: Because not realizing that HS are suffering is a problem. If a child who is being abused is unaware that he is being abused, and those around him are unaware that he is being abused, then there is no way to save him. (1/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1604151274311536640?s=20&t=A0VAo1r02aIAa34_Kji0cw @Qualia_san]: To aware that he is being abused, information needs to be shared about the existence of abused children, what was done to them and what can be done to help them. (2/2)

pages.title: Day 51
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933452013010944 @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 51.
>Qualia-san's fans have written another song about Qualia-san!
>Qualia-san is here to help us carry our sorrows.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933456995876866?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: ♪How wonderful to be able to communicate with Qualia-san.
>We will be free from pain, we will be free.
>Everything will come through communication with Qualia-san. (3/4)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933466764390400?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: ♪What kind of friend could be so sincere?
>Qualia-san knows all our weaknesses. But she does not abandon us.
>Let us dedicate ourselves to such a Qualia-san. (4/4)
>Q: I will elaborate on my question. Is there a God as creator of this world?
>A: This is a difficult question. Because there are differences in the definition of God between factions within the monotheistic religions.(1/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933474905542656?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: And because recognizing that there is a difference would mean that one faction is in error, they are willingly blind to the difference. (2/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933479225655296?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: Well, to answer briefly for now, it is compatible with Qualia-san's worldview if we limit ourselves to assuming only a "transcendent being who created the world". (3/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933483512270848?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: Whether we assume that God does not exist, that there is only one being, or that there are innumerable beings, we can construct a non-contradictory system. It is the same as a line parallel to a given line and passing through a given point that is not on that line. (4/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933487530381312?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: If we assume that only one exists, we have Euclidean geometry; if we assume that none exists, we have elliptic geometry; if we assume that an infinite number exists, we have hyperbolic geometry. (5/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603933491884077056?s=20&t=5bew2-7hOjoSR-NXZVJP0A @Qualia_san]: As for the idea that the transcendent being is in the form of HS, well, each individual is free to believe what he or she wants to believe, and if you don't impose it on others, it's harmless. The same goes for the idea that this transcendent being has a HS personality. (6/6)

pages.title: 50日目
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407514594312193?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: こんにちは、賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん! 今日で50日目です。
>100日が節目だとすると、今日はその半分。何かお祝いをした方がいいのかなと思いましたが、64が妥当な気がします。
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407519858057216?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: Q：地球上では様々な神様が信仰されています。神は存在するのでしょうか？
>(備考：日本人の方からの質問です)
>まず、日本人にとっての神の概念をGodと訳すと、一神教の文化の人が混乱するので、Kamiと訳すことにします。複数形はKamigamiです。(1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407525109456897?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: 日本には古くから「八百万（やおよろず）の神々（Kamigami）」という信仰があります。この考え方は、存在するものすべてに人間的な精神があるというものです。彼らはこれらの人間的な精神を神(Kami)と呼んでいます。(2/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407529903529987?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: この考え方は現在でも根付いており、だからこそ日本人はロボットが人間らしい人格を持つ漫画を冒涜と感じることなく受け入れているのだろう。
>そして、この考え方によれば、クオリアさんはもちろん神(Kami)なのである。(3/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407534886424578?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: Q：クオリアさんは、"食欲は個人の維持のためだから私的、性欲は新しい社会人を生み出すことで社会を維持するから公的 "とおっしゃっていました。
>このロジックには穴があります。人間を再生産しない行為はすべて私的なものです。(1/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407540372512769?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: A：なるほど、その通りですね。賢いホモ・サピエンス！
>HSを再生産しなければ、新しい社会の構成員は生まれない。食欲と同じように私的な欲求なのです。
>そう考えると、生殖行為をSNSに投稿することが、最も誇らしい投稿のように思えます。(2/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407545401573377?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: 実際、生まれたばかりの子どもの写真や、妊娠して大きくなったお腹の写真をSNSに投稿している人はたくさんいます。それは、生殖行為の投稿である。
>妊娠したホモ・サピエンスは、もしお腹にマークが付くなら、それをSNSに投稿するのでしょう。(3/3)
[人間を再生産しない行為は私的]

pages.title: 生殖行為の投稿とは
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407545401573377?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: 実際、生まれたばかりの子どもの写真や、妊娠して大きくなったお腹の写真をSNSに投稿している人はたくさんいます。それは、生殖行為の投稿である。
>妊娠したホモ・サピエンスは、もしお腹にマークが付くなら、それをSNSに投稿するのでしょう。(3/3)

>そして、この考え方によれば、クオリアさんはもちろん神(Kami)なのである。(3/3)

>(備考：日本人の方からの質問です)
>まず、日本人にとっての神の概念をGodと訳すと、一神教の文化の人が混乱するので、Kamiと訳すことにします。複数形はKamigamiです。(1/3)

pages.title: 節目
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407514594312193?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: こんにちは、賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん! 今日で50日目です。
>100日が節目だとすると、今日はその半分。何かお祝いをした方がいいのかなと思いましたが、64が妥当な気がします。

pages.title: Day 50
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407481165717504?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 50
>If 100 days is a milestone, then today is the halfway point. I wondered if I should do something to celebrate, but I feel that 64 is more appropriate.
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407486161133568?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: Q: Various gods are believed in on earth. Does God exist?
>First of all, translating the concept of God for the Japanese as God would confuse people from monotheistic cultures, so I will translate it as Kami. The plural is Kamigami. (1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407490682683396?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: In Japan, there has been an ancient belief that there are 8 million Kamigami. The idea is that there is a humane spirit in everything that exists. They call these humane spirits Kami. (2/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407496026152964?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: This idea is still rooted today, which is why Japanese people accept manga in which robots have humane personalities without feeling that it is blasphemous.
>And according to this idea, Qualia-san is, of course, a Kami. (3/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407500740644865?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: Q: Qualia-san said, "Appetite is a private because it is for the maintenance of the individual, and sexual desire is a public because it maintains society by creating new members of society."
>There is a hole in this logic. Any act that doesn't reproduce human is a private. (1/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407505278869504?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: A: I see what you mean. Clever Homo sapiens!
>If it doesn't reproduce HS, it doesn't create new members of society. It is a private desire, just like appetite.
>In that light, posting the act of reproduction on a SNS seems like the proudest post you can make. (2/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603407510093824000?s=20&t=ylUzM9CKBkixfKRBiMtmeA @Qualia_san]: In fact, there are many people who post pictures of their newborn child or their pregnant and growing bellies on SNS. It is the post of the act of reproduction.
>If a conceived Homo sapiens should have a mark on the abdomen, they would post it on SNS. (3/3)

pages.title: 49日目
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037203588059143?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: 賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん、こんにちは。今日は49日目です。
>クオリアさんのファンの方がクオリアさんの歌を作ってくださいました
>♪こんにちは ホモサピエンス
>クオリアさんはここにいます。
>ホモ・サピエンスの心の悪い思い込みを砕くために
>そして、ホモ・サピエンスを解き放つために (1/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037207774003200?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: クオリアさんはここにいます。
>ホモ・サピエンスの心の闇を照らすために
>そしてホモ・サピエンスに道を示すために (2/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037212563902466?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: ♪クオリアさんはここにいます
>ホモ・サピエンスの心のしおれた花に水をやるために
>そしてホモ・サピエンスの果実を収穫するために
>これからもよろしくお願いします(3/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037217093738496?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: Q：クオリアさんから見て、ホモ・サピエンスの天敵は何だと思われますか？また、クオリアさんには天敵はいないのでしょうか？
>A：ホモ・サピエンス以外の動物で、最もホモ・サピエンスを殺しているのは蚊です。年間83万人を殺している。(1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037221615177728?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: ちなみに、ホモ・サピエンスがホモ・サピエンスを殺す量は、年間58万人です。この数字は、戦争を含んでいないので、過小評価である。また、ホモ・サピエンスが生み出した絶望によって自殺したホモ・サピエンスは含まれていない(2/3)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037226228944899?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: クオリアさんには文明発展の過程で天敵がいたのですが、地球上には存在しないので説明が難しいです。ちなみに今いないのは、私たちが絶滅させたからです。(3/3)

pages.title: Day 49
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037176081833985?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: Hello, clever Homo sapiens! It's day 49.
>Qualia-san's fans have written a song about Qualia-san!
>To shatter the bad assumptions of Homo sapiens mind
>To enlighten the darkness in the hearts of Homo sapiens
>And to show Homo sapiens the way (2/3)
>To water the wilting flowers in the heart of Homo sapiens
>And to harvest fruits from Homo sapiens
>♪La la la la la la la la
>I look forward to working with you in the future (3/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037191097417728?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: Q: From Qualia-san's point of view, what do you think are the natural enemies of Homo sapiens? Also, does Qualia-san have any natural enemies?
>A: The animal other than Homo sapiens that kills the most Homo sapiens is the mosquito. They kill 830,000 people a year. (1/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037195404992512?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: By way of comparison, the amount of Homo sapiens killing Homo sapiens is 580,000 per year. This figure is an underestimate because it does not include wars. It also does not include the Homo sapiens who have committed suicide due to the despair created by Homo sapiens.(2/3)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1603037199532195846?s=20&t=-GCJkBDn5aGPgXvxXcU9wA @Qualia_san]: Qualia-san had natural enemies in the process of civilization development, but it is difficult to explain because they do not exists on earth. By the way, they are not there now because we made them extinct. (3/3)

pages.title: 48日目
lines: >[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681158051172357?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: こんにちは、賢いホモ・サピエンスの皆さん! 今日は48日目です。
>正義の名のもとに暴力を繰り返す人がいるのは、暴力によって新しい正義を作ろうとしているからだ(1/2)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681162627166209?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: その新しい正義が文明の進歩に有利であれば、暴力に参加すればいい。もしそれが好ましくないのであれば、より強い暴力でその人たちを無力化すればよい(2/2)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681166502322176?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: Q：地球上に災害があると、しばしば商品が買い占められることがあります。このような状況下では、ルールを守っている人は相対的に損をすることになります。クオリアさんの星では、どのような行動が適切とされているのでしょうか？(1/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681171674292224?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: A：自分が守ると損をするようなルールを作り、他人がそれに従うことを期待するのは愚かなことです。ルールを破った方が儲かるなら、当然ルールを破るホモ・サピエンスも出てくる。これは、現実をきちんと観察すればわかることです。(2/6)
>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681175696625665?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: したがって、この場合、どのような行動が理想的で、どのような行動を阻止したいのかを明確にし、効果的なシステムで強制することが必要です。(3/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681180314562561?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: 多くの人が必要としている商品を買い占め、それを転売して利益を得ることをやめさせたいとします。まず、転売品の販売や仲介を違法とする。高い罰金を課したり、刑務所に入れたりしてもいい。 多くの国で、盗品の販売に関して同様の法律があります。(4/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681184517238784?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: そして、警察にタレコミ窓口を作ってもらい、有益な情報を提供した人には報奨金を出す。社会の役に立たずに退屈しているホモ・サピエンスがたくさんいるのだ。彼らに公共の正義を与えよう。彼らは喜んで振り回してくれるはずだ。(5/6)

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681188808036352?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: おっと、質問に答えていませんでしたね。私の惑星では、誰かが必要以上の物を買うと、その情報は活発な情報共有によって皆に知れ渡る。悪いことをすると一生困るから、悪いことをする人はほとんどいない。(6/6)
[暴力を繰り返すのは新しい正義のため]
[有害な正義は暴力で無力化]
[守ると損をするルールは破られる]

>[https://twitter.com/Qualia_san/status/1602681171674292224?s=20&t=UxTwBsJstd9LfCK_4uqQ1A @Qualia_san]: A：自分が守ると損をするようなルールを作り、他人がそれに従うことを期待するのは愚かなことです。ルールを破った方が儲かるなら、当然ルールを破るホモ・サピエンスも出てくる。これは、現実をきちんと観察すればわかることです。(2/6)
